text: Does anyone know if it’s possible to get rid of this incridbly annoying 24x40px padding in the iframe container? We’re already working with limited screen real estate, and I really don’t see a reason for the additional 24x40px padding.

Hello all, does anyone know if there's a way to integrate a sort of autodialer to HubSpot? I know how to start a call from within, when there's phone integration. I'm not sure how to deliver a call to  the SDR. Thanks in advance
